OOC:hm k scrap my post abot them leaving okie dokie?
Destructor would have fought for kit kat to go first but he was already in 
stasis lock. He sank into the tank and felt relief spread through his body."
Carnatron turned into his black suit with the decepticon symbol on the back 
and front. His mouth opened dripping venom, "Those maximals are pathetic..yet 
all of our warriors are almost scrap...indeed the power of revenge is 
great...we must be ready." He saw Hy dras in the tank, he turned and walked 
into the science bay and injected himself with energon. He formed a pocket and 
plaed a few injections so if he was injured it would heal him or partly. He 
sent a telepathic message to Flicker. "Flicker sir, now that you are in 
command please come walk with me we have some things to discuss if you would 
deem it proper." 
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw helps Destructor to the CR tank, and then returns to KitKat. He sees 
> her double over.
> SharpClaw: Your more injured then your letting on. Let me help you. You dont 
> need to keep up the act around friends.
> SharpClaw put her arm over his shoulder, and did the same so he could help her 
> walk.
> SharpClaw: I take it we'll be going to the med bay untill a tank is open.
>  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::
> 
> She looked at SharpClaw after he kissed her cheek. She didn't 
> understand how bots could be emotional when a war was going on. She 
> smirked at him. "Uh, yeah, anyway, no I do not need attention. But 
> Destructor here needs it more than me. He took a pit of a beating. 
> Get him to the chamber first. I'll take the second one."
> 
> She took a step and fell to her knees, holding her stomach were 4 
> wounds were leaking heavily.  She groaned loudly and checked her 
> level. 15% and dropping. Breathing heavy she got up and started to 
> walk, rather wobbly to the maintenance bay.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > : : SharpClaw : :
> > SharpClaw climbed out of the resteration tank, and headed over to 
> KitKat.
> > SharpClaw: I'm glad to know that you can joke, and not always be 
> buisness. I dont usually say this to anyone, but thank you for 
> getting me back here.
> > SharpClaw kissed KitKat on her cheak.
> > SharpClaw: Now I thank you may need some medical attention yourself.
> >  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:KitKat::
> > 
> > She looked to Destructor. "You take the next CR chamber. I will 
> hold 
> > out untill another one is available." Her levels were dropping 
> > rapidly.  She opened her comlink to SharpClaw. "Hey, lazy bolts, 
> you 
> > aobut done with that chamber, we have wounded bots that need it. 
> > There are only so many chambers you know." she said, with a slight 
> > chuckle in her voice. She groaned softly as her wounds almost 
> caused 
> > her to double over.
